availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John James Leary (Gallatin County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Gallatin County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Henry Leary and Matilda Leary. Married to Mary E. Craig Leary in Grant County, Kentucky on November 29, 1865. Farmer in Gallatin County, Kentucky in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Gallatin County, p. 623.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Grant County Marriages, Film #000266222, p. 100.
